name: ezr² Portable Interpreter
description:
ezr² is an easy to learn and practical programming language made in C#. This is a portable interpreter for ezr² made with Unity and ezrSquaredNet4.8, a version of ezr² compiled as a class library with .NET 4.8.

Bug reports, features requests, questions and all that: GitHub Issues · Uralstech/ezrSquaredNet4.8
